title: Venom & Glory
description: The world already knows who I am.  Destroyer. Killer. I am ruler. I reign. My kingdom, my family--I am in control.  I was never supposed to fall for her.  Power. Beauty. Strength.  She makes me vulnerable. She could get me killed.  And I'll be damned if my heart is my weakness. When it comes down to the kingdom and what I desire . . . the kingdom will always win.
author: S.   Williams
